name: Gimme Meow
description:
Cats come to a shrine to pray for a desired object, with a specific size and orientation in mind :
- Observe and try to replicate the object
- Maintain click to scale up the object, then click again to rotate it
- The more you progress, the harder the cats are to satisfy
Have fun ! 

Antoine Druaux : Music and sounds
Garance Royère : art
Géraud Zucchini : design and code
